column4: does anyone use network-manager-pptp to create vpn connection in Ubuntu Gutsy?
do you remember the plugin or vpn altogether been updated since release of gutsy?
sorry ? I only tried it after Gutsy was released, but it all worked at that point ...
okay, there seems to be something broken here, all the settings seem to be fine, but the vpn account is grayed out on network-manager when using mobile dialup...
I think that's a pretty common issue ...
with a simple solution ... but I can't remember it off-hand ...
seems that the dialup even isn't the only reason
I just got it working on my laptop - that quickly ... anything in the pptp client FAQ ?
is the connection that you're using (over which you want use the pptp tunnel) configured by NetworkManager ?
have you restarted NetworkManager since configuring the VPN connection ?
I've found one reference which indicates that use of the ppp0 interface makes it problematic
okey, so that's not going to work anyway then, I wonder what's up with the rest of the vpn problems
what have your other VPN issues been ?
